parameters:
What's up, sis? This place doesn't exactly have the best
crowd. If you don't want to run into trouble, you better
head home.

You had a rough time before, didn't you? I told you, didn't
I? That the clientele here is bad...

It's best not to talk to the guys drinking in the back room.
They're infamous for their bad drinking habits.

Lately, there's been a spate of incidents where courtesans
are being kidnapped. It'd be safer for you, young lady, not
to wander about at night.
Gahahaha! The booze tastes great tonight too!

Oh!? What's up, miss? Haven't seen your face around here
before. Are you a girl from the shop?
Come over here and pour us some drinks! Gahahaha--!

Oh! You're quite the seductive one up close. A young lady's
nape is just to this old man's liking\I[15]
Hehe! Pour some for me too, young lady.
--Karin went around pouring drinks for the men.
Hehehe... She's sound asleep, isn't she♪

We switched to stronger liquor halfway through. She won't be
waking up easily.

This is a private room. No one outside will know. It's the
girl's fault for sleeping so defenselessly. We'll have our
fun as payment for the booze♪

\c[27]Main acts +6, vaginal ejaculation +3, external ejaculation
+3, lewdness +5\c[0]
I'm sorry! I'm not one of the shop's girls! Goodbye~~~!

I wonder where Mouse Komachi has gone off to... I wanted to
thank her at least once for scattering those koban that I
picked up and won big with at gambling.

It seems there's a bodyguard working as a geisha in the
pleasure district. I heard she took down a samurai retainer
with her bare hands just recently.
